document_data.name: Delgar Munsch
document_data.mainbody:
'''Delgar Munsch''' was a hunter at [[Bridgefort]] in [[Boareskyr Bridge]] around [[1368 DR]].

He owned a cabin in the area, where Delgar and his company of hunters took their prey, including [[goblin]]s and [[orc]]s, which they later sold at [[Baldur's Gate]]. Around [[1367 DR]], he retired after a very good season but when the [[crusade of the Shining Lady]] arrived nearby he joined the crusaders, even becoming an officer.

He was a man with an inflated sense of his own importance but he was a superb hunter.
